title: Tech News: Virtual Real Estate Values Plummet in the Metaverse
itunes:title: Tech News: Virtual Real Estate Values Plummet in the Metaverse
description:
Late last year, speculation around the metaverse fed into a crazy market for virtual real estate. Six months later, values have dropped 80%. What happened? Plus an update on Apple's battle with Ericsson and how some researchers were able to defeat a next-generation encryption strategy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: Apple, Ericsson, patent, Colombia, 5G, iPhone, HBO Max, Warner Bros, Discover, Discovery+, Tencent, Ubisoft, video games, quantum computing, encryption, metaverse, cryptocurrency, NFT, NFTs, SpaceX, Starlink, electric vehicles, EV
